TopicTitle: The unofficially official 0.24-Kerbapalooza Thread - Now extra #HYPETRAIN!

Articles.Content: This is Kerbal Space Program, we need a hype ROCKET with infinite boosters, not no stinkin' train!

Remember guys. There will be no release today.

Baht why not?

I'm in tears, I love you Squad.

http://i.gyazo.com/0c7bc4b64c4069d62f7680b57b9f4f53.png

Edit: After my initial LOL, 'please return to your seats' could be interpreted many different ways...

I know when I seen that I felt like a stalker that just got noticed! LOL'd so hard.

The devs are working their rear off. I'm just pacing around the office pretending it helps them somehow.

Damnit Maxmaps. Do choooochooo noises and get the camera.
Lol steamdb dafuq?

Baht why not?

He's either trolling, or is posting based on Maxmaps' tweet yesterday that there would be no release 'today', which is now, of course, yesterday.

We were told to remain seaten in the train !

THERE WILL BE RELEASE TODAY ! or not.
I'm hungry, but I'm scared to go down o the kitchen and get food as .24 might get released.
aparrently the game is free now steamdb: Changed price ru 469Ã‘â‚¬. Ã¢â‚¬Âº 0Ã‘â‚¬.

He's either trolling, or is posting based on Maxmaps' tweet yesterday that there would be no release 'today', which is now, of course, yesterday.

Yeah, I suppose so?
Man was not built for this kind of hype...

xD I just actually imagined that.

No no, you have to think in your mind the sound a steam train makes when it goes from a stand-still to full-speed. How the rotations start slow and slowly go faster....

...now take that sound, and replace the train steam sounds with "Hype".

Hype... hype.... hype.. hype.. hype.. hype. hype. hype. hype. hype-hype-hype-hype-hype-hype-hype-HYYYYYYYPPPPE.... HYYYYPPPPPEE.... hype-hype-hype-hype-hype.....

At least, it makes sense my my head!

He's either trolling, or is posting based on Maxmaps' tweet yesterday that there would be no release 'today', which is now, of course, yesterday.

Timezones FTW.

Man was not built for this kind of hype...

More strouts.
My seatbelt doesn't work!

I'm hungry, but I'm scared to go down o the kitchen and get food as .24 might get released.

I feel the same way

You're off.

*kicks in the butt off the train*

LOL. Does this mean the rear of the train is open to boot off those who attempt to derail HYPETRAIN?

He's either trolling, or is posting based on Maxmaps' tweet yesterday that there would be no release 'today', which is now, of course, yesterday.

Maxmaps, did you mean that there will be no release this day? On the day 17.7.2014? (day month year)

Hype train currently.
Maybe they are trying to figure out which moon of Jool they can put an actual Hypetrain on.
My seat on the Hypetrain has no seatbelt... and it smells like its been in a fire... and its melty. Is it supposed to be like this?

Maxmaps, did you mean that there will be no release this day? On the day 17.7.2014? (day month year)

In relation to the Squad offices in Mexico City, that message was posted toward the end of what would be considered the working day yesterday. They've also been re-building the hype (as if that was necessary), which I doubt they'd do if they had zero intention of at least trying to release today.

Of course, I could be wrong. I'm just crazy for contracts!
